member.name: T:IPA.Loader.Features.Feature
member.summary: The root interface for a mod Feature.
member.remarks: Avoid storing any data in any subclasses. If you do, it may result in a failure to load the feature.

member.name: M:IPA.Loader.Features.Feature.Initialize(IPA.Loader.PluginLoader.PluginMetadata,System.String[])
member.summary:
Initializes the feature with the parameters provided in the definition.
Note: When no parenthesis are provided, is an empty array.
member.remarks:
This gets called BEFORE your Init method.
Returning does *not* prevent the plugin from being loaded. It simply prevents the feature from being used.
member.param: the metadata of the plugin that is being prepared
the parameters passed to the feature definition, or null
member.returns: if the feature is valid for the plugin, otherwise

member.name: M:IPA.Loader.Features.Feature.Evaluate
member.summary:
Evaluates the Feature for use in conditional meta-Features. This should be re-calculated on every call, unless it can be proven to not change.
This will be called on every feature that returns from
member.returns: the truthiness of the Feature.

member.name: P:IPA.Loader.Features.Feature.InvalidMessage
member.summary: The message to be logged when the feature is not valid for a plugin. This should also be set whenever either or returns false.

member.name: M:IPA.Loader.Features.Feature.BeforeLoad(IPA.Loader.PluginLoader.PluginMetadata)
member.summary: Called before a plugin is loaded. This should never throw an exception. An exception will abort the loading of the plugin with an error.
member.remarks: The assembly will still be loaded, but the plugin will not be constructed if this returns . Any features it defines, for example, will still be loaded.
member.param: the plugin about to be loaded
member.returns: whether or not the plugin should be loaded

member.name: M:IPA.Loader.Features.Feature.BeforeInit(IPA.Loader.PluginLoader.PluginInfo)
member.summary: Called before a plugin's Init method is called. This will not be called if there is no Init method. This should never throw an exception. An exception will abort the loading of the plugin with an error.
member.returns: whether or not to call the Init method

member.name: M:IPA.Loader.Features.Feature.AfterInit(IPA.Loader.PluginLoader.PluginInfo,IPA.IBeatSaberPlugin)
member.summary: Called after a plugin has been fully initialized, whether or not there is an Init method. This should never throw an exception.
member.param: the plugin that was just initialized
the instance of the plugin being initialized

member.name: M:IPA.Loader.Features.Feature.AfterInit(IPA.Loader.PluginLoader.PluginInfo)
member.summary: Called after a plugin has been fully initialized, whether or not there is an Init method. This should never throw an exception.
member.param: the plugin that was just initialized

member.name: M:IPA.Loader.Features.Feature.RequireLoaded(IPA.Loader.PluginLoader.PluginMetadata)
member.summary: Ensures a plugin's assembly is loaded. Do not use unless you need to.
member.param: the plugin to ensure is loaded.

member.name: P:IPA.Loader.Features.Feature.StoreOnPlugin
member.summary: Defines whether or not this feature will be accessible from the plugin metadata once loaded.

member.name: T:IPA.Loader.PluginInitInjector
member.summary: The type that handles value injecting into a plugin's Init.

member.name: T:IPA.Loader.PluginInitInjector.InjectParameter
member.summary: A typed injector for a plugin's Init method. When registered, called for all associated types. If it returns null, the default for the type will be used.
member.param: the previous return value of the function, or if never called for plugin.
the of the parameter being injected.
the for the plugin being loaded.
member.returns: the value to inject into that parameter.

member.name: M:IPA.Loader.PluginInitInjector.AddInjector(System.Type,IPA.Loader.PluginInitInjector.InjectParameter)
member.summary: Adds an injector to be used when calling future plugins' Init methods.
member.param: the function to call for injection.

member.name: T:IPA.Logging.Logger
member.summary: The logger base class. Provides the format for console logs.

member.name: P:IPA.Logging.Logger.LogFormat
member.summary: The standard format for log messages.

member.name: T:IPA.Logging.Logger.Level
member.summary: An enum specifying the level of the message. Resembles Syslog.

member.name: F:IPA.Logging.Logger.Level.None
member.summary: No associated level. These never get shown.

member.name: F:IPA.Logging.Logger.Level.Debug
member.summary: A debug message.

member.name: F:IPA.Logging.Logger.Level.Info
member.summary: An informational message.

member.name: F:IPA.Logging.Logger.Level.Notice
member.summary: A notice. More significant than Info, but less than a warning.

member.name: F:IPA.Logging.Logger.Level.Warning
member.summary: A warning message.

member.name: F:IPA.Logging.Logger.Level.Error
member.summary: An error message.

member.name: F:IPA.Logging.Logger.Level.Critical
member.summary: A critical error message.

member.name: T:IPA.Logging.Logger.LogLevel
member.summary: An enum providing log level filters.

member.name: F:IPA.Logging.Logger.LogLevel.None
member.summary: Allow no messages through.

member.name: F:IPA.Logging.Logger.LogLevel.DebugOnly
member.summary: Only shows Debug messages.

member.name: F:IPA.Logging.Logger.LogLevel.InfoOnly
member.summary: Only shows info messages.

member.name: F:IPA.Logging.Logger.LogLevel.NoticeOnly
member.summary: Only shows notice messages.

member.name: F:IPA.Logging.Logger.LogLevel.WarningOnly
member.summary: Only shows Warning messages.

member.name: F:IPA.Logging.Logger.LogLevel.ErrorOnly
member.summary: Only shows Error messages.

member.name: F:IPA.Logging.Logger.LogLevel.CriticalOnly
member.summary: Only shows Critical messages.

member.name: F:IPA.Logging.Logger.LogLevel.ErrorUp
member.summary: Shows all messages error and up.

member.name: F:IPA.Logging.Logger.LogLevel.WarningUp
member.summary: Shows all messages warning and up.

member.name: F:IPA.Logging.Logger.LogLevel.NoticeUp
member.summary: Shows all messages Notice and up.

member.name: F:IPA.Logging.Logger.LogLevel.InfoUp
member.summary: Shows all messages info and up.

member.name: F:IPA.Logging.Logger.LogLevel.All
member.summary: Shows all messages.

member.name: F:IPA.Logging.Logger.LogLevel.Undefined
member.summary: Used for when the level is undefined.

member.name: M:IPA.Logging.Logger.Log(IPA.Logging.Logger.Level,System.String)
member.summary: A basic log function.

member.name: M:IPA.Logging.Logger.Log(IPA.Logging.Logger.Level,System.Exception)
member.summary: A basic log function taking an exception to log.

member.name: M:IPA.Logging.Logger.Debug(System.String)
member.summary: Sends a debug message. Equivalent to Log(Level.Debug, message);

member.name: M:IPA.Logging.Logger.Debug(System.Exception)
member.summary: Sends an exception as a debug message. Equivalent to Log(Level.Debug, e);

member.name: M:IPA.Logging.Logger.Info(System.String)
member.summary: Sends an info message. Equivalent to Log(Level.Info, message).

member.name: M:IPA.Logging.Logger.Info(System.Exception)
member.summary: Sends an exception as an info message. Equivalent to Log(Level.Info, e);

member.name: M:IPA.Logging.Logger.Notice(System.String)
member.summary: Sends a notice message. Equivalent to Log(Level.Notice, message).

member.name: M:IPA.Logging.Logger.Notice(System.Exception)
member.summary: Sends an exception as a notice message. Equivalent to Log(Level.Notice, e);

member.name: M:IPA.Logging.Logger.Warn(System.String)
member.summary: Sends a warning message. Equivalent to Log(Level.Warning, message).

member.name: M:IPA.Logging.Logger.Warn(System.Exception)
member.summary: Sends an exception as a warning message. Equivalent to Log(Level.Warning, e);

member.name: M:IPA.Logging.Logger.Error(System.String)
member.summary: Sends an error message. Equivalent to Log(Level.Error, message).

member.name: M:IPA.Logging.Logger.Error(System.Exception)
member.summary: Sends an exception as an error message. Equivalent to Log(Level.Error, e);

member.name: M:IPA.Logging.Logger.Critical(System.String)
member.summary: Sends a critical message. Equivalent to Log(Level.Critical, message).

member.name: M:IPA.Logging.Logger.Critical(System.Exception)
member.summary: Sends an exception as a critical message. Equivalent to Log(Level.Critical, e);

member.name: T:IPA.Logging.LogPrinter
member.summary: The log printer's base class.

member.name: P:IPA.Logging.LogPrinter.Filter
member.summary: Provides a filter for which log levels to allow through.

member.name: M:IPA.Logging.LogPrinter.Print(IPA.Logging.Logger.Level,System.DateTime,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Prints a provided message from a given log at the specified time.
member.param: the time the message was composed
the name of the log that created this message

member.name: M:IPA.Logging.LogPrinter.StartPrint
member.summary: Called before the first print in a group. May be called multiple times. Use this to create file handles and the like.

member.name: M:IPA.Logging.LogPrinter.EndPrint
member.summary: Called after the last print in a group. May be called multiple times. Use this to dispose file handles and the like.

member.name: T:IPA.Logging.StandardLogger
member.summary: The default (and standard) implementation.
member.remarks:
uses a multi-threaded approach to logging. All actual I/O is done on another thread, where all messaged are guaranteed to be logged in the order they appeared. It is up to the printers to format them.
This logger supports child loggers. Use to safely get a child. The modification of printers on a parent are reflected down the chain.

member.name: P:IPA.Logging.StandardLogger.ConsoleWriter
member.summary: The for writing directly to the console window, or stdout if no window open.

member.name: M:IPA.Logging.StandardLogger.AddDefaultPrinter(IPA.Logging.LogPrinter)
member.summary: Adds to the default printer pool that all printers inherit from. Printers added this way will be passed every message from every logger.

member.name: P:IPA.Logging.StandardLogger.PrintFilter
member.summary: All levels defined by this filter will be sent to loggers. All others will be ignored.

member.name: M:IPA.Logging.StandardLogger.Configure(IPA.Config.SelfConfig)
member.summary: Configures internal debug settings based on the config passed in.

member.name: M:IPA.Logging.StandardLogger.GetChild(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a child printer with the given name, either constructing a new one or using one that was already made.
member.returns: a child with the given sub-name

member.name: M:IPA.Logging.StandardLogger.AddPrinter(IPA.Logging.LogPrinter)
member.summary: Adds a log printer to the logger.

member.name: M:IPA.Logging.StandardLogger.Log(IPA.Logging.Logger.Level,System.String)
member.summary: Logs a specific message at a given level.

member.name: M:IPA.Logging.StandardLogger.Debug(System.String)
member.summary: An override to which shows the method that called it.

member.name: M:IPA.Logging.StandardLogger.LogThread
member.summary: The log printer thread for .

member.name: M:IPA.Logging.StandardLogger.StopLogThread
member.summary: Stops and joins the log printer thread.

member.name: T:IPA.Logging.LoggerExtensions
member.summary: A class providing extensions for various loggers.

member.name: M:IPA.Logging.LoggerExtensions.GetChildLogger(IPA.Logging.Logger,System.String)
member.summary: Gets a child logger, if supported. Currently the only defined and supported logger is , and most plugins will only ever receive this anyway.
member.returns: the child logger

member.name: T:IPA.IBeatSaberPlugin
member.summary: Interface for Beat Saber plugins. Every class that implements this will be loaded if the DLL is placed at data/Managed/Plugins.

member.name: M:IPA.IBeatSaberPlugin.OnApplicationStart
member.summary:
Gets invoked when the application is started.
THIS EVENT WILL NOT BE GUARANTEED TO FIRE. USE Init OR INSTEAD.

member.name: M:IPA.IBeatSaberPlugin.OnApplicationQuit
member.summary: Gets invoked when the application is closed.

member.name: M:IPA.IBeatSaberPlugin.OnUpdate
member.summary: Gets invoked on every graphic update.

member.name: M:IPA.IBeatSaberPlugin.OnFixedUpdate
member.summary: Gets invoked on ever physics update.

member.name: M:IPA.IBeatSaberPlugin.OnSceneLoaded(UnityEngine.SceneManagement.Scene,UnityEngine.SceneManagement.LoadSceneMode)
member.summary: Gets invoked whenever a scene is loaded.

member.name: M:IPA.IBeatSaberPlugin.OnSceneUnloaded(UnityEngine.SceneManagement.Scene)
member.summary: Gets invoked whenever a scene is unloaded

member.name: M:IPA.IBeatSaberPlugin.OnActiveSceneChanged(UnityEngine.SceneManagement.Scene,UnityEngine.SceneManagement.Scene)
member.summary: Gets invoked whenever a scene is changed
member.param: The Scene that was previously loaded

member.name: T:IPA.IDisablablePlugin
member.summary: Provides methods to allow runtime enabling and disabling of a plugin.

member.name: M:IPA.IDisablablePlugin.OnEnable
member.summary: Called when a plugin is enabled. This is where you should set up Harmony patches and the like.
member.remarks:
This will be called after Init, and will be called when the plugin loads normally too. When a plugin is disabled at startup, neither this nor Init will be called until it is enabled.
Init will only ever be called once.

member.name: M:IPA.IDisablablePlugin.OnDisable
member.summary: Called when a plugin is disabled at runtime. This should disable things like Harmony patches and unsubscribe from events. After this is called there should be no lingering effects of the mod.
member.remarks: This will get called at shutdown, after , as well as when the plugin is disabled at runtime.

member.name: T:IPA.IEnhancedBeatSaberPlugin
member.summary: An enhanced version of a standard BeatSaber plugin.

member.name: P:IPA.ModsaberModInfo.CurrentVersion
